text: @realDonaldTrump Republican Asa Hutchinson refuses to put a shelter in place and Hot Springs went from 25 to 125 in a matter days! Everyone is still pretending Coronavirus doesn't exist shopping,   city parks are open , children are out of school only to be all over town in groups
